text: [TRAFFIC NOISE]

Business people look
at doctors and say they
don't understand the numbers.

Doctors look at business
people and say all they

care about are the numbers,
when in reality, we really

need a collaboration
between the two fields.

I am the co-founder and medical
director for Valera Health.

And what we do is we enable
health care organizations

to provide the most effective
and efficient behavioral health
care.

The way we started was really
a few of us getting in the room

and saying, why isn't
anyone using technology

to change how mental
health is delivered.

I feel as physicians the
most important thing is

to meet your patients
where your patients are.

And frankly, today most
people use digital devices.

We provide a way to
improve communications

between the patient and
their health care team.

I believe the
Blavatnik Fellowship

will allow me to
interact with some

of the top professors,
venture capitalists, insurance

companies, and thought
leaders in the industry.

And this will
definitely accelerate
the development of my startup.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
